segments.text: ( Before Christmas Party ) Are you ready for the Christmas party tonight
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Almost . I have to get dressed . It's a formal party and I have special party make up !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Use this lipstick and it will make your lips shine !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! Uh , remember that there's a gift exchange , too . We all have to bring a gift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( At the Party ) It's Christmas Eve ! Time to open presents !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! It's just what I wanted !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! Why don't I have any presents !
segments.speaker: S1
